synopsis.text: Lupin and his friends steal a mysterious metal artifact from Area 51, unwittingly attracting the attention of a dangerous group called the Bloody Angels. This all-female terrorist organization is determined to get their hands on the artifact to further their own agenda. Though normally drawn to female admirers, Lupin realizes the Bloody Angels pose a real threat. Meanwhile, Inspector Zenigata partners with a talented female officer to track down both Lupin's gang and the terrorist group. With multiple parties pursuing Lupin for the Area 51 treasure, he faces perhaps his most perilous heist yet. The artifact holds an intriguing alien secret which could shift the balance of power. To survive, Lupin must outmaneuver ruthless adversaries while unraveling the truth behind his enigmatic prize.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
